attributes.action: REMOVAL of the Muslims Against Crusades "SICK RACE HATE" Website
attributes.additional_details:
This E-petition is asking for the REMOVAL of the SICK RACE HATE PROMOTING website that glorifys anything ANTI British, OUR way of life & INCITES HURT HARM & VIOLENCE towards every day Brits.. from the sick ABUSE directed at our Brave troops, the burning of Poppys and anything to do with Christianity & PEACE...

www.muslimsagainstcrusades
